58ca773b44b4b.Name: LLP011 List adddresses to select from
58ca773b44b4b.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search_after},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
AND postcode != ''
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300"}

{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
	sao as flat_out,
	pao as house_out,
	street_name as street_out,

58ca9f8575eb5.Name: PRO010 Load Profile info to SFG Cust Details
58ca9f8575eb5.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select * From
(select
	1 as IDZZ,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom','',{postcode}) as postcode_out5,
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom',{postcode},'') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{country_id} as sel_country,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAi' as haveRun
union select
	2 as IDZZ,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as sel_country,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAe' as haveRun) Combine
Where
	IDZZ = (select if({subParm} like '%dA%' 
			and {subParm} not like '%oNA%'
			and {postcode} is not null ,1,2) as test)"}

58cac46f269a2.Name: LLP017 Change to Use Customer Recorded
58cac46f269a2.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {flat}, '') as flat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {house}, '') as house_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {street}, '') as street_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {town}, '') as town_out, 
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {country}, '') as country_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {uprn}, '') as uprn_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lng}, '') as lng_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lat}, '') as lat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existSelected,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existingCustomer,
 'ProcAi' as haveRun"}

',''),if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',''))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from (select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, {postcode_out51} as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%',0,1)) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%',0,1)) as p2, if({postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%' or {subParam} like '%mPo%',0,1)) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[Uu][Bb]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|YO|ZE|yo|ze)[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4) as c) as b ON a.id = b.id","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

5bace9758fbd2.Name: HMO003 - Clear the same details for card payment

props.label: html 9
props.content:
Portsmouth City Council will process your personal information in accordance with data protection law. The personal details provided by you will be used by Private Sector Housing for the purposes of mandatory HMO licensing. Your details will be held on a database and where the law allows, may be shared with other departments such as the Planning department, within the council for the purposes of keeping a HMO database / updating details they hold about you. The council may also be required to disclose personal information to third parties such as other local authorities issuing HMO licenses or Police, Department for Work and Pensions or for the National Fraud Initiative for the purposes of preventing or detecting crime or apprehending or prosecuting offenders. Some of this data including the license holder's name, address and contact details are required by law to be displayed on a public register.

For further information about how the Council collects and uses personal information please visit our website: https://www.portsmouth.gov.uk/ext/the-council/data-protection-privacy-notice

props.label: html 1
props.content:
We are required by law to provide certain information on a public register and this includes the licence holder's name, address and contact details.

Please note: You only need to apply for a HMO licence if the property has 5 or more unrelated individuals.

The basic fee for this application is determined by the maximum number of people able to live in the HMO. (The maximum number would be decided by the number of kitchen/bathroom facilities provided and the room sizes).

The term “occupants” relates to the number of persons / households that COULD be housed within the property. Therefore, if the property has the potential to house 8 households (taking into account room sizes and amenities), the fee payable would be for 6 to 10 persons.

If you are making multiple applications, the “single application” fee will be taken for the smallest property you require a licence for.

html 6
props.content:
Floor Plans of property

The plan does not need to be drawn professionally nor to scale. It must however provide a suitable indication of the property layout. Please ensure the following are included:

  1. Label the use of each room (e.g. bedroom, living room, kitchens, bathrooms, dining/living rooms etc).
  2. Indicate the room size (e.g. 9 m2, 3m x 3m etc.)
  3. Indicate the position of fire detectors and fire blankets within the property.

html 6
props.content:
You must let certain people know in writing that you have made this application. These people are:

  1. Mortgage of the property.
  2. Owner of the property to which the application relates: eg: the freeholder and any head lessees who are known.
  3. Any person who is a tenant or long term leaseholder of any part (including any flat) who is known to you other than a statutory tenant or other tenant.
  4. The proposed licencee holder.
  5. The proposed managing agent, if applicable.
  6. Any person who has agreed that they will be bound by any condtion(s) in a licence if granted.

props.label: html 4
props.content: We are required by law to provide certain information on a public register and this includes the licence holders name, address and contact details.

props.label: html 5
props.content: *I confirm that as the proposed licence holder and/or proposed manager

props.label: I do not have any unspent convictions particulary in respect of any offences involving fraud or other dishonesty, or violence or drugs, or any offences listed under Schedule 3, of Sexual Offences Act 2003

I have not been found guilty by any court or tribunal of practising unlawful discrimination on grounds of sex, colour, race, ethnic or national origins or disability in, or in connection with, the carrying on of any business.
I have not had any judgments (whether civil or criminal) against me under housing, environmental health, public health or landlord and tenant law
I have not acted otherwise than in accordance with any applicable code of practice approved under Section 233 of the Housing Act 2004
html 7
props.content: *I confirm that as the proposed licence holder and/or proposed manager the following does not apply to anyone I am associated with on a personal, work or other basis

props.label: Are not in control of any property subject to a Control Order under S379 of the Housing Act 1985 or Demolition Order in the last 5 years
Are not in control of a property that has been subject to the service of an Improvement Notice, a Prohibition Order, a Hazard awareness notice, or Emergency Remedial Action under the Housing Act 2004
Have not  been refused a licence or had a licence revoked for any property in relation to a property under the Housing Act 2004
Have not been found to have breached a condition of a licence for any property under the Housing Act 2004
Are not in control of any property, which has subsequently been the subject of an Interim or Final Management Order or Special Interim Management Order under the Housing Act 2004
